org.jcvlib.image

Class Misc

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvlib.image.Misc

  • public class Misc
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains miscellaneous image processing methods.

    • Method Detail

      • floodFill

        public static Image floodFill(Image image,
                              Point seed,
                              double distance,
                              Color fillColor,
                              Direction directionType,
                              FloodFillRange rangeType)
        Flood fill algorithm for fill some region.

        This region is detected by start position and distance between color of start point and neighbors of this point.

        Links:
        1. Flood fill -- Wikipedia.
        2. Euclidean distance -- Wikipedia.

        Parameters:
        image - Source image.
        seed - Start point.
        distance - Distance between start color and color all others neighbor points. Uses for compare Euclidean distance between two pixels. Maximum value for image with 3 channels is 442.
        fillColor - Fill color value.
        directionType - Type of direction: 4 or 8. See Misc.DIRECTIONS_TYPE_*.
        rangeType - Define how to calculate difference: calculate difference between the current pixel and seed pixel or difference between neighbor pixels (i.e. the range is floating). See Misc.FLOOD_FILL_RANGE_*.
        Returns:
        Single-channel Image that contains filled region (with Color.MAX_VALUE on filled points).

      • floodFill

        public static Image floodFill(Image image,
                              Point seed,
                              double distance,
                              Color fillColor)
        Same as floodFill(Image, Point, double, Color, Direction, FloodFillRange), but as default direction type uses Direction.TYPE_8 and as range type uses FloodFillRange.FIXED.

      • sumArea

        public static java.util.List<Jama.Matrix> sumArea(Image image)
        Calculate summed area table.

        Links:
        1. Summed area table -- Wikipedia.

      • buildPyramidUp

        public static Image buildPyramidUp(Image image)
        Upsamples image.

        This algorithm blur image first (with kernel [5 x 5]) and duplicate each row and each column then. Used into buildPyramidGauss(Image, Size).

        Parameters:
        image - Source image.
        Returns:
        Upsample image.

      • buildPyramidDown

        public static Image buildPyramidDown(Image image)
        Downsamples image.

        This algorithm blur image first (with kernel [5 x 5]) and remove each odd row and column then. Used into buildPyramidLaplace(Image, Size).

        Parameters:
        image - Source image.
        Returns:
        Downsample image.

      • buildPyramidGauss

        public static java.util.List<Image> buildPyramidGauss(Image image,
                                                      Size minSize)
        Create the Gaussian pyramid for an image.

        Links:
        1. Gaussian pyramid -- Wikipedia.
        2. Pyramid (image processing) -- Wikipedia .

        Parameters:
        image - Source image.
        minSize - Minimal image size into created pyramid.
        Returns:
        Pyramid of images.

      • buildPyramidGauss

        public static java.util.List<Image> buildPyramidGauss(Image image)
        Same as buildPyramidGauss(Image, Size) but use size [16 x 16] as default minimal image size.

      • buildPyramidLaplace

        public static java.util.List<Image> buildPyramidLaplace(Image image,
                                                        Size maxSize)
        Create the Laplacian pyramid for an image.

        Links:
        1. Laplacian pyramid -- Wikipedia.
        2. Pyramid (image processing) -- Wikipedia .

        Parameters:
        image - Source image.
        maxSize - Maximal image size into created pyramid.
        Returns:
        Pyramid of images.

      • injectImage

        public static Image injectImage(Image baseImage,
                                Point injectPosition,
                                Image injectImage)
        Put one image to another (using Alpha channel).

        The images must have the same channels size. The last channel uses as Alpha channel.

        Links:
        1. Alpha channel -- Wikipedia.

        Parameters:
        baseImage - This image will be changed. This image should have 3 or 4 channels!
        injectPosition - Position where will be injected injectImage on baseImage.
        injectImage - This image injected to baseImage image. This image should have 3 or 4 channels!
        Returns:
        Image with combination of baseImage and injectImage. That image have same size and type as baseImage and have 3 channels.

      • sum

        public static Image sum(Image image1,
                        Image image2)
        This method sum 2 given images. Analog union for binary images and sets.

        If value of color will be more than Color.MAX_VALUE this color value set Color.MAX_VALUE.

        Links:
        1. Union (set theory) -- Wikipedia.

      • absDiff

        public static Image absDiff(Image image1,
                            Image image2)
        Absolute value of difference between 2 images.

      • minus

        public static Image minus(Image image1,
                          Image image2)
        First image minus second image. Analog complement for sets.

        If value of color will be less than Color.MIN_VALUE this color value set Color.MIN_VALUE.

        Links:
        1. Complement (set theory) -- Wikipedia.

      • calculateMean

        public static Color calculateMean(Image image)
        Return arithmetic mean of colors in current image.

        Links:
        1. Arithmetic mean -- Wikipedia.
